comment:
Drammers Club online pour. Great stuff that can change one’s mind of what they like and don’t like whether cask strength and/or peated. This was my first time trying a quadruple distilled and a hazmat 70%+ abv bottling. 


Octomore X4+10:

Nose: Vanilla, Peach, Caramel, Cherries, Smoke, Iodine, Flowers, Apricots, Sultanas, Pears, Raisins, Toffee, Citrus, Pineapple, Passion Fruit, Mango, Peaches, Minerals, Milk Chocolate, Melted White Chocolate

Palate: Caramel, Toffee, Raisins, Sultanas, White Chocolate Raspberry Truffle Haagen Dazs Ice Cream, Pears, Citrus, Honey, Flowers

Finish: Vanilla, Flowers, Raspberries, White Chocolate, Smoke, Tar, Raisins, Sultanas, Peaches, Caramel
